name: Descenders
description: Descenders is extreme downhill freeriding for the modern era, with procedurally generated worlds, and where mistakes have real consequences. Will you lead your team to glory and become the next legendary Descender?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550/equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: High-range Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760/equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
